title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: Current Research
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Paleontology     Current Research                 Current Research       Research at the monument If you are interested in conducting scientific research at Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument please submit an application for a permit through the National Park Service Research Permit and Reporting System. Learn more about research at the monument: Microscopic timecapsules Measuring ancient mountains Studying ancient patterns In search of fossil mammals Well preserved?
